titles.title: Environmental Defense Act of 1993
To require the Secretary of Education to investigate the feasibility of establishing a National Environmental Science and Policy Academy.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E2764)
Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

committee.name: House Committee on Education and Labor

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Postsecondary Education and Training.

bill.summary: 11/3/1993--Introduced. Environmental Defense Act of 1993 - Directs the Secretary of Education to investigate the feasibility of the Federal Government establishing a National Environmental Science and Policy Academy. Requires a report, with recommendations, to the Congress.
